import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Post } from 'src/models/post.model'; import { HomeService } from 'src/services/home.service'; import { IPost } from 'src/components/post/post.class'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit{ posts: IPost[] = []; constructor( private homeService: HomeService ) { } async ngOnInit() { //let posts: IPost = Object.assign({}, this.checkoutForm.value); this.getData(); } public async getData(){ (await this.homeService.getPost()).subscribe(resp => { console.log(resp); this.posts = resp; console.log(this.posts); }); } }
